Tommy's birthday is next week.  He is hoping for a very special gift.  What are some
ewlinethings Tommy is hoping for?
ewline
ewlineHe would like a big, bouncy ball, like his friends Bobby and Joey have.  One with blue
ewlinestripes!
ewline
ewlineHe would really like some new sneakers.  Danny, Tommy's best friend, got a special pair of
ewlinesneakers for HIS birthday last month.  They have pictures of robots on them and even light
ewlineup when you walk!
ewline
ewlineHe would really, REALLY like a shiny new bicycle.  Tommy has an old bicycle now. He is
ewlinegetting too big for it.  He saw a red one in the store yesterday when he was shopping with
ewlinehis Mom.  It looked like it was the right size for him!
ewline
ewlineBut what Tommy wants most of all is a new baby brother.  Today his Mom and Dad said that
ewlinehe might have one very, very soon.  Then Tommy and his little brother can have many fun
ewlinebirthdays together.  That would be the best gift of all!
